 List of all the logs currently open.

Detailed Description

Log manager.

This takes care of cleaning up after all the logs when the program exits.

See also:
PhLog

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

phoenix::PhLogManager::~PhLogManager (  ) 

Destructor.

When this object is destroyed it will automatically delete all the logs currently loaded.

Member Function Documentation

PhLog* phoenix::PhLogManager::openLog ( std::string  logName,
std::string  logFileName 
)

Open log.

Opens a log and adds it to the log manager for garbage collection.

Parameters:
logName The name associated with the log.
logFileName The name of the log in memory.
